effect.en: Discard any number of Energy cards attached to any of your Pokémon. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards discarded this way. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage times the amount of [G] Energy attached to Exeggutor. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
